info.description: This is a REST API for PoeticMetric.
info.title: PoeticMetric REST API

post.description: Activate user with the activation token.

get.description: Read currently authenticated user's organization.

delete.description: Delete organization and all associated data irreversibly.

get.description: List possible organization deletion reasons.
Read the current plan of the authenticated user's organization.

post.description: Resend the e-mail with the e-mail address verification code to the user.
post.summary: Resend user e-mail address verification e-mail

post.description: Reset user's password also deleting all existing user access tokens for that user.
Send a password recovery e-mail to the user.

get.description: Read currently authenticated user.

post.description: Create a user access token by authenticating with the e-mail address and password.

delete.description: Delete user access token currently in use.

patch.description: Verify user's e-mail address by the verification code.

get.description: check if the bootstrap process is already done.

post.description: check if the bootstrap process is already done.

get.description: Read browser name report for a site.
Read browser version report for a site.
Read country report for a site.
Read device type report for a site.
Read Google search terms report for a site.
Read language report for a site.
Read operating system name report for a site.
Read operating system version report for a site.
Read overview report for a site.
Read page view report for a site.
Read path report for a site.
Read referrer report for a site.
Read referrer host report for a site.
Read time of week trends report for a site.
get.summary: Read time of week trends report

get.description: Read UTM campaign report for a site.
Read UTM content report for a site.
Read UTM medium report for a site.
Read UTM source report for a site.
Read UTM term report for a site.
Read visitor report for a site.
List sites.
Read an organization site.

post.description: Set site's Google OAuth refresh token using oauth.
post.summary: Set site Google OAuth refresh token

get.description: List Google Search Console sites for the site with Google OAuth refresh token.
List users.
Read a user from the organization.

delete.description: Delete a user from the organization.
